SELECT /* BestContentsMapper.xml, selectBestContentsVodList, 홍지호, 2014-02-03 */ LA.TOTAL_COUNT , LA.RNUM , LA.TOP_MENU_ID , LA.MENU_ID , LA.PROD_ID , LA.PART_PROD_ID , LA.META_CLSF_CD , LA.EXPO_ORD , LA.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD FROM ( SELECT KA.* FROM ( SELECT JA.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY JA.EXPO_ORD) AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT IA.*, COUNT(IA.PROD_ID) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.PROD_ID ORDER BY D.UPD_DT DESC) AS RN , B.TOP_MENU_ID , A.MENU_ID , A.PROD_ID , I.PART_PROD_ID , A.EXPO_ORD , D.META_CLSF_CD , D.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , J.DRM_YN FROM (SELECT A.TENANT_ID ,A.PROD_ID ,A.MENU_ID ,A.EXPO_ORD FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD A WHERE A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} /* header param : tenantId */ AND A.LIST_ID = #{listId} /* param : listId */ AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' /* 전시여부 */ AND TO_CHAR(A.STD_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') = #{stdDt} /* 기준일시 */ ) A , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY B , TB_DP_PROD D , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD G , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP I , TB_DP_PROD J , TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE K WHERE A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND A.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = G.PROD_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = G.TENANT_ID AND A.PROD_ID = I.PROD_ID AND I.PART_PROD_ID = J.PROD_ID AND I.PART_PROD_ID = K.PROD_ID AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' /* Y : 사용 (사용여부) */ AND D.SVC_GRP_CD = 'DP000203' /* DP000203 : 멀티미디어 */ AND D.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD = 'PD002501' /* PD002501 : 채널타입 */ AND G.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' /* PD000403 : 판매중 */ AND G.EXPO_YN = 'Y' /* Y : 노출 (노출여부) */ AND I.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' /* DP010802 : 채널-에피소드 상품 관계 */ AND J.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD = 'PD002502' /* PD002501 : 에피소드타입 */ AND (K.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} OR K.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = 'android_standard2') /* header param : 단말모델코드 */ AND (CASE WHEN (SELECT VIDEO_DRM_SPRT_YN FROM TB_CM_DEVICE WHERE DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd}) = 'N' AND NVL(J.DRM_YN, 'N') = 'Y' THEN 'NOT SUPPORT' ELSE 'SUPPORT' END) = 'SUPPORT' /* DRM 미지원 단말이고 에피소드 상품이 DRM 상품일 경우 노출 안함 */
AND B.TOP_MENU_ID IN ('DP17', 'DP18') /* 탑메뉴ID */
AND B.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP17' /* 탑메뉴ID */
AND B.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP18' /* 탑메뉴ID */
AND D.PROD_GRD_CD IN
#{prodGradeCd}
) IA WHERE IA.RN = 1 ) JA ) KA WHERE KA.RNUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND #{count} ) LA

SELECT /* BestContentsMapper.xml, selectBestContentsBookList, 홍지호, 2014-02-03 */ LA.TOTAL_COUNT , LA.RNUM , LA.TOP_MENU_ID , LA.MENU_ID , LA.PROD_ID , LA.PART_PROD_ID , LA.META_CLSF_CD , LA.EXPO_ORD , LA.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD FROM ( SELECT KA.* FROM ( SELECT JA.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY JA.EXPO_ORD) AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT IA.*, COUNT(IA.PROD_ID) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER( ) OVER ( PARTITION BY A.PROD_ID ORDER BY DECODE( L.BOOK_CLSF_CD, E.BOOK_CLSF_CD, 1, 2 ) , TO_NUMBER( REGEXP_REPLACE( L.CHAPTER, '[^[:digit:]]') ) DESC , NVL( J.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD, 'PD00310' ) DESC , J.UPD_DT DESC ) AS RN , B.TOP_MENU_ID , A.MENU_ID , A.PROD_ID , I.PART_PROD_ID , A.EXPO_ORD , D.META_CLSF_CD , D.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD FROM (SELECT A.TENANT_ID ,A.PROD_ID ,A.MENU_ID ,A.EXPO_ORD FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD A WHERE A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} /* header param : tenantId */ AND A.LIST_ID = #{listId} /* param : listId */ AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' /* 전시여부 */ AND TO_CHAR(A.STD_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') = #{stdDt} /* 기준일시 */ ) A , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY B , TB_DP_PROD D , UV_TB_DP_MULTIMDA_PROD E , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD G , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP I , TB_DP_PROD J , TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE K , UV_TB_DP_MULTIMDA_PROD L WHERE A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND A.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = G.PROD_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = G.TENANT_ID AND A.PROD_ID = I.PROD_ID AND I.PART_PROD_ID = J.PROD_ID AND I.PART_PROD_ID = K.PROD_ID AND I.PART_PROD_ID = L.PROD_ID AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' /* Y : 사용 (사용여부) */ AND D.SVC_GRP_CD = 'DP000203' /* DP000203 : 멀티미디어 */ AND D.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD = 'PD002501' /* PD002501 : 채널타입 */ AND G.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' /* PD000403 : 판매중 */ AND G.EXPO_YN = 'Y' /* Y : 노출 (노출여부) */ AND I.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' /* DP010802 : 채널-에피소드 상품 관계 */ AND J.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD = 'PD002502' /* PD002502 : 에피소드 */ AND (K.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} OR K.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = 'android_standard2') /* header param : 단말모델코드 */
AND B.TOP_MENU_ID IN ('DP13', 'DP14') /* 탑메뉴ID */
AND B.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP13' /* 탑메뉴ID */
AND B.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP14' /* 탑메뉴ID */
AND D.PROD_GRD_CD IN
#{prodGradeCd}
) IA WHERE IA.RN = 1 ) JA ) KA WHERE KA.RNUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND #{count} ) LA
